price: O ljudi, Gospodara svog se bojte! Zaista će potres, kad Smak svijeta nastupi, veliki događaj biti!
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُواْ رَبَّكُمۡۚ إِنَّ زَلۡزَلَةَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ شَيۡءٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu ittaqū rabbakum inna zalzalata al-sāʿati shayon ʿaẓīmun
